name: Boge
description:
THE GAME

Boge is a top-down camera wave game in which the UI elements are interactive. It is made for a practice of the design subject at EVAD Formacion.

CONTROLS
  • WASD => Movement.
  • Left click => Shoot.
  • E => Interact.
  • Escape => Pause.
FEATURES

The interactive interface is the main feature of the game. You must move your own life to avoid taking damage and move the bomb to position where you want it to explode, but you can't carry both at the same time.

HOW TO PLAY

The player's objective is to complete all waves of enemies. The player will have a simple gameplay to quickly get familiar with the mechanics.
